metadata.name: Advanced Agent Architectures
metadata.description: Cutting-edge agent architectures including ReAct, Reflection, Tree of Thoughts, Plan-and-Execute, BabyAGI, AutoGPT, and CAMEL-AI

react_pattern.description: Reasoning and Acting - Synergize reasoning traces and task-specific actions
react_pattern.key_concept: Interleave thought, action, and observation in a loop

reflection_pattern.description: Self-critique and iterative refinement through think-act-reflect loops
reflection_pattern.key_concept: Agent evaluates its own outputs and improves them

tree_of_thoughts.description: Explore multiple reasoning paths simultaneously with evaluation and pruning
tree_of_thoughts.key_concept: Generate multiple solution paths, evaluate them, and explore the most promising

plan_and_execute.description: Strategic planning phase followed by execution phase
plan_and_execute.key_concept: First create a comprehensive plan, then execute it step by step

babyagi.description: Autonomous task queue system with creation, prioritization, and execution
babyagi.key_concept: Agent creates tasks, prioritizes them, and executes autonomously

autogpt.description: Autonomous agent with goal breakdown and independent execution
autogpt.key_concept: Agent breaks down goals and executes them independently with minimal human intervention

camel_ai.description: Structured role-play framework with multi-agent pipelines and RAG
camel_ai.key_concept: Agents take on specific roles and collaborate through structured communication

verifier_models.description: Models trained to verify logic and outputs of other models
verifier_models.key_concept: Separate model checks the reasoning and outputs for correctness

context_graphs.description: Graph-based context management for long-horizon tasks
context_graphs.key_concept: Represent task context as a graph to guide agent through complex workflows

best_practices: Choose architecture based on task complexity
Implement proper error handling and recovery
Use logging and tracing for debugging
Set resource limits (time, tokens, API calls)

title: Advanced agent architectures Knowledge

axiomAlignment.A1_verifiability: Patterns are verified through automated testing.
axiomAlignment.A2_user_primacy: The user maintains control over all generated output.
axiomAlignment.A3_transparency: All automated actions are logged and verifiable.
axiomAlignment.A4_non_harm: Strict safety checks prevent destructive operations.
axiomAlignment.A5_consistency: Uniform patterns ensure predictable system behavior.
